titles.title: Real Estate Investment Thrift Savings Act of 2006
A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for a real estate stock index investment option under the Thrift Savings Plan.

bill.summary: 4/3/2006--Introduced. Real Estate Investment Thrift Savings Act of 2006 - Amends Federal law relating to the Federal Employees' Retirement System to provide for the establishment of a Real Estate Stock Investment Fund under the Thrift Savings Plan.
